member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.name: T:L5R_API.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:L5R_API.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: check id for single card

member.name: M:L5R_API.Controllers.CardRatingController.updateCard(System.String,System.Single,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is used in conjunction with posting a new userrating This starts the process of adding the new value into the cardrating database This also calls the update of the card effected.
member.param: the new rating being added to the card
this will either be 0 or 1 and this adds a new vote to the card
The clan that the rating corresponds to

member.name: M:L5R_API.Controllers.UserRatingController.Post(L5R_API.Models.CreateUserRating)
member.summary: This creates a new user rating. It containts the username which is used to check if they have voted on the card before

member.name: T:L5R_API.Models.Card
member.summary: Represents one card within the database

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.id
member.summary: This is primary key that is used in conjunction with the ratings table. This is the ID of the card that is in the context of name-name. EG: shrewd yasuki = shrewd-yasuki Any apostrophes are replaced with dashes. EG: Mountain's Anvil Castle = mountain-s-anvil-castle

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.clan
member.summary: This is the clan that the card corresponds to: this includes the main clans and neutral type

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.cost
member.summary: This is the card cost in fate.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.decklimit
member.summary: How many of the cards are legally allowed to be in the decks.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.element
member.summary: This is used to categorize provinces into the different types

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.fate
member.summary: This is how much fate a stronghold will yeild a turn.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.glory
member.summary: This is the glory value of a card (if it has one)

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.honor
member.summary: This is how much honor you will start the game with. This is used for stronghold cards only.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.imglocation
member.summary: This is the image location from the official l5r website.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.influencecost
member.summary: This is the influence cost that is related to the conflict card. (if it has one)

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.influencepool
member.summary: This is the influence pool that your stronghold provides.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.isrestricted
member.summary: This indicates whether the card is restricted The restricted list is derived from the official rules guide.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.military
member.summary: This is the military value on the character card. if not applicable - put a 0.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.militarybonus
member.summary: This is the added bonus an attachment provides a character. if not applicable - put a NULL

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.name
member.summary: This is the name of the card as written on the card

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.political
member.summary: This is the political value on the character

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.politicalbonus
member.summary: This is the political bonus an attachment provides a character.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.rolerestriction
member.summary: This indicates whether a card is restricted to 'KEEPER' or 'SEEKER' - null if not

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.side
member.summary: This indicates which deck the card lies within.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.strength
member.summary: This indicates the strength of the province. IE how much above your opponent you need to be to break the province.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.strengthbonus
member.summary: This applies to stronghold provinces. It indicates the added strength bonus it provides on top of the province it is above.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.text
member.summary: This is the card text

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.type
member.summary: This is the card type.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.Card.unicity
member.summary: This indicates whether the card is unique or not. TRUE / FALSE

member.name: M:L5R_API.Models.ReadCard.#ctor(System.Data.DataRow)
member.summary: This reads the rows and places the values within the card object.

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.CardRating.id
member.summary: This is the id that is shared with card id's - this is a foreign key

member.name: P:L5R_API.Models.CardRating.overallrating
member.summary: this a calculation: (rating + votes) + n + n / total of all votes
